ModMetaData.name: [1001]Expanded Shells
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
1.4 NOTE: Boomalope shells are not working yet. I'll keep working on it, but I wanted to get the VHE shell, big firefoam shell, and soap shells out, since they're the ones I use most often. 

This mod adds artillery shells in keeping with vanilla that are in between existing shells.
 For the moment, four shells are added: 
 a "Very High Explosive Shell," which has the same damage stats as the High Explosive Shell but has a larger blast radius,
 a "Heavy Firefoam Shell," which again spreads firefoam over a larger area, and 
 a "Soap Shell," which removes filth in a large area around the shell. 
 a "Boomalope Shell," which releases some angry boomalopes around the shell.
Planned: a "Silver Shell," which tempts raiders to abandon the raid in favor of gathering the spread silver, a "Hat Shell," which inflicts a "horrified" debuff on nearby raiders, an "Acid Shell," which causes a damage over time hediff, and a "Turret Shell," which drops a self-powered mini-turret at its point of impact.
Also, textures. If anyone likes making textures, I would appreciate textures for my shells, because my attempts at textures are terrible.
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: https://github.com/papercrane1001/ExpandedShells


Credit to prism's MortarManiac and Noodles' More Psycasts for some extremely useful code.
